episodes.title: Cult Stories - Episode One - Deployable Agent
episodes.description: Welcome to Cult Stories. This is a podcast about a cult from the Kenai Peninsula of Alaska called The Body and the murder that led to the discovery of the group. This was made by Syran Warner. Marc Wade Bisset is the leader of the cult. Okanogan County, Tonasket, Nikiski, Cult Hunter, Gary Parker, Katie Quinn, Catie Quinn, KSRM, Peninsula Clarion, Sarah Koenig, True Story, True Crime, The Best Podcast of 2024, Cool Stuff, Genghis Muskox, Paul Vermillion, City Pages, a million dollars.

episodes.title: Visiting Eckankar: Is it a Cult?
episodes.description: A rare unguided trip to Eckankar with a few questions.

episodes.title: A Cult Called "The Body" Heads To Court In Washington State (2023)
episodes.description:
The Body is Christian Fundamentalist Cult that began as a family run bible study on the Kenai Peninsula of Alaska shortly after the turn of the century. Things changed dramatically when an ambitious and charismatic deacon named Marc Bisset arrived from a church in Marshall, Texas and took over the group. 

Today, The Body exists on a compound in Tonasket, Washington. This is the home of a man named Christopher Coombes who was released on bail paid for by The Body's trust, Lookout Ranch, while awaits trial for the most severe of sex crimes. 

In this video, Syran Warner illustrates how the current state of The Body is influenced by the past. If you have a tip, please email contact@thebodyintl.com

episodes.title: A Cult Called The Body // Chris Arrested 2023
episodes.description: Marc Bisset and Gary Everett Parker started a clandestine cult in Nikiski, Alaska called The Body. Some really bad things have happened, but what Chris Coombes stands accused of now is the worst story that's come out of all this.

episodes.title: Alexandra Stein Knows Cults
episodes.description: These are clips from Zoom conversations with Alexandra Stein. Many are relevant to the conversation surrounding Linda Good-McGillis and Profundity Yours in Marietta, Texas. Alex was in a cult for over a decade. Once she got out she turned to academia to research the phenomenon and got her PhD in social psychology from the University of Minnesota.

episodes.title: Dr. Janja Lalich talks Profundity Yours, Identifying Cults and More with Syran Warner
episodes.description:
Syran Warner interviews Janja Lalich. 
Profundity Yours. Linda Good McGillis.

Media and information available via email contact@thebodyintl.com

episodes.title: The Cult of Profundity Yours
episodes.description:
Profundity Yours is a new age group with a ranch in Texas. In this video, we see a collection of clips recorded by the groups leader and hear recollections from from former members. 

contact@thebodyintl.com

episodes.title: A Collection Of TikTok's About A Cult Called The Body And A Plot To Krill A Senator By @syranwarner
episodes.description: There's a cult called The Body in Tonasket, Washington and Tumut, Australia that came from The Kenai Peninsula of Alaska and the story is breaking on TikTok.

episodes.title: Members of The Body Arrested in Okanogan County
episodes.description: Here is the bodycam footage of members of The Body being arrested and a little girl being rescued straight from the sheriff's office. For more information on The Body, a destructive c*lt originally from Alaska, visit thebodyintl.com or cultstories.com

episodes.title: Reporting a Cult Called The Body to the FBI and the Plot to Krill Mitch McConnell
episodes.description:
We'll call this a short documentary to please the algorithms. It's an updated version of a video from 2021 documenting a wild attempt to get evidence concerning a destructive cult called The Body in the hands of the FBI. When the Bureau refuses to provide a method to send digital documents there way, a plan is hatched by a journalist to report himself for a serious crime while making the claim that a murder plot is on the computer he desperately wants an agent to take a look at. The target of the plot? Mitch McConnell. It's ridiculous, but a good example of how far this reporter will go in his battle against the cult. You'll notice some creative editing to turn this thing into safe and legal fun for adults. 

For more information on The Body watch The Land of The Body: An Alaskan Cult Story or go to www.thebodyintl.com 

This video contains music by Krill and Frankie Cosmos.

episodes.title: The Land of The Body: An Alaskan Cult Story
episodes.description:
This short documentary tracks a cult called The Body that originated on the Kenai Peninsula of Alaska in 2003. For nearly 20 years, the group has been largely hidden, but a few business records and a property sale are revealing. 
The story is told through eight years of original interviews and video shot on location in 2021. Find out who's behind the cult and why their practice of "washing" is so disturbing. There's even a cameo from Sarah Koenig for eagle eyed viewers.
For more information about The Body head to thebodyintl.com or email contact@thebodyintl.com

The cult currently resides in Tonasket, Washington and Tumut, Australia.
